title: odunybiz
author: odunybiz
content: Nigeria, a blessed country. A country highly blessed with natural resources. I keep wondering why our leaders are not trying to do things right.People are really suffering. There is increase in everything. Is say it again everything. What make things more hard is the fuel subsidy removal which has caused an increase in cost of transportation. Although, the feredal Government has planned to give N8000 to over 12 million low-income earners to help cushion the effect of this subsidy removal.How good is this plan to the masses? Will this money truly be circulated to the masses or later been embezzled? Remember $800m has been borrowed for this purpose. This is a very huge amount of money. Is there any needs for us to borrow money from world bank again with the present situation of the country? How many of us received COVID 19 relieve fund? Few, even mostly in the north. Almost all was diverted into their purse. I thought this money should be used to develop our infrastructural, education, health sector and to build industries around every part of the country so that our youths can get employment.
